card.name: Station Ticket-Taker
card.text: When Station Ticket-Taker enters, you may search your library for a basic land card or Station card, reveal it, shuffle, then put it into your hand or on top of your library. Conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library if you put it into your hand. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Scavenging Prowler
card.text: Prowess 3B/G, Exile Scavenging Prowler from your graveyard: Return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Archery Club Member
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) This creature has first strike as long as it’s your turn.

card.name: Blastbreath Elder
card.text: Menace Valiant — Whenever Blastbreath Elder becomes the target of a spell or ability you control for the first time each turn, it gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Guardian Ushi-Oni
card.text: Trample When Guardian Ushi-Oni enters, up to one [target creature gets +2/-2 until end of turn.] Paradigm shift {B} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for {B})

card.name: Reckless Revelries
card.text: Choose one — • Reckless Revelries deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker. • Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Honor-Worn Harisen
Battle Spirit
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Just as Taught
card.text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn if {G} was spent to cast this spell. Then it deals damage equal to its power to target creature.

card.name: Soul Spite
card.text: Choose one — • Soul Spite deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. • Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Ardent Novelist
card.text: When Ardent Novelist enters, you may pay {R/G}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains your choice of trample or haste until end of turn.

card.name: Rebellious Maiko
card.text: Vigilance Whenever a Spirit you control enters, up to one target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Regal Teacher
card.text: Regal Teacher has first strike as long as it’s attacking. Whenever you draw a card, except for the first card you have drawn this turn, you may create a 1/1 white and black Student creature token. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: Hellraisers Seraph
card.text: Flying When Hellraisers Seraph enters, [Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.] Paradigm shift 1G (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 1G)

card.name: Relentless Innovation
card.text: Return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Binding Prank
card.text: Binding Prank has ward {2} as long as you control a Spirit. When Binding Prank enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Binding Prank leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Slip on the Mask
card.text: Target creature you control gains protection from colorless or from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Serpentine Companion
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay {2}{W/U} or exile a creature card from your graveyard. Vigilance, reach

card.name: Biology Professor
card.text: Trample Valiant — Whenever Biology Professor becomes the target of a spell or ability you control for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Senzao Ascetic
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) This creature can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Greater Toad Sage
card.text: Trample When Greater Toad Sage enters, if it entered from a graveyard or was cast from a graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Bakeneko City-Goer
card.text: When Bakeneko City-Goer enters, [create a 1/1 white and black Student creature token.] If you control another Spirit, you gain 3 life. Paradigm shift {G} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for {G})

card.name: Itsumade Naturalist
card.text: Whenever you spend four or more mana to cast a spell, surveil 1. If you put a card into your graveyard this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Itsumade Naturalist.

card.name: Peaceful Tanuki
Light-Hearted Goading
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures you control. They each deal damage equal to their power to target creature you don’t control.

card.name: Will to Protect
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn. If {W} was spent to cast this spell, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Spiritual Connection
card.text: Mill four cards. Then you may return a creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand. 3G, Exile Spiritual Connection and a creature card from your graveyard: You gain life equal to the exiled creature’s power.

card.name: Run the Rails
card.text: Choose one — • Search your library for a basic land card or Station card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. • Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Traveller's Insight
card.text: Draw three cards, then discard a card unless two or more mana from Stations was spent to cast Traveller’s Insight.

card.name: Hidanko Prefect
card.text: Prowess {2}{U/R}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Kajiwara's Lookout
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature card leaves your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Kajiwara’s Lookout. You may surveil 1.

card.name: Dusk Boundary Watchers
card.text: When Dusk Boundary Watchers enters, you may [destroy target creature] that was dealt damage this turn. Paradigm shift 3B (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 3B)

card.name: Station Wraith
card.text: Menace When Station Wraith enters, if two or more mana from stations was spent to cast it, each opponent discards a card. For each opponent who can’t, you draw a card.

card.name: Remnant of Ancestry
card.text: When Remnant of Ancestry enters, you may mill four cards. 3B: Return Remnant of Ancestry from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped with two +1/+1 counters and a finality counter. It becomes a Horror in addition to its other types.

card.name: Dragon's Bargain
card.text: If {R} was spent to cast this spell, it deals 3 damage to each opponent. Return up to two creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Dread Their Return
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a creature card with mana value 3 or less. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Encroaching Madness
card.text: Choose one — • Target player sacrifices a creature. • Target player sacrifices a planeswalker. • Target player sacrifices an enchantment.

card.name: Void-Fettered Monstrosity
card.text: Menace When Void-Fettered Monstrosity enters, [up to two target creatures can’t block this turn.] Paradigm shift 1R (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 1R)

card.name: Hidanko Instructor
card.text: Prowess When Hidanko Instructor enters, [each opponent sacrifices a creature.] Paradigm shift 1B (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 1B)

card.name: Shoreline Leviathan
Taraikyo Showstopper
card.text: Trample Whene Taraikyo Showstopper enters, up to one [target creature gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible until end of turn.] Paradigm shift 1G (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 1G)

card.name: Taraikyo Tachiyaku
card.text: Trample Taraikyo Tachiyaku enters with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Taraikyo Tachiyaku dies, if it had counters on it, put those counters on up to one target creature.

card.name: Hidanko Swordmaster
card.text: Flash Prowess When Hidanko Swordmaster enters, surveil 2.

card.name: Corrupted Remnant
card.text: Double strike, haste Corrupted Remnant enters with two +1/+1 counters on it if it entered from a graveyard or was cast from a graveyard.

card.name: Shining Star Aspirant
card.text: Vigilance Valiant — Whenever Shining Star Aspirant becomes the target of a spell or ability you control for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it and prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn.

card.name: Combatant's Uplink
card.text: Flash When Combatant’s Uplink enters, up to one target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. 1R, Discard a card, sacrifice Combatant’s Uplink: Draw two cards.

card.name: Messy Kouhai
card.text: When Messy Kouhai enters, draw a card. If you control another Spirit, Scry 2 then draw a card instead.

card.name: Gale Drake Rider
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) Flying

card.name: Malevolent Whispers
card.text: Flash Enchant creature. Enchanted creature get +1/+0. As long as you’ve cast an instant spell or a spell with flash this turn, enchanted creature has “When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner’s control.”

card.name: Augmented Proctor
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant card, sorcery card and card with paradigm shift in your graveyard. Flash Augmented Proctor enters tapped if it’s not your turn.

card.name: Seijuku First-Year
card.text: Flash {W/B}, Sacrifice Seijuku First-Year: counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1}

card.name: Exert Reality
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may conjure a card named Fatigue on the top of your library. If you do, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”) Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.

card.name: Disaster Site Surveyor
card.text: When Disaster Site Surveyor enters, you may conjure a duplicate of target instant card, sorcery card or card with paradigm shift in your graveyard into your hand.

card.name: Studious Ningyo
card.text: Prowess When Studious Ningyo enters, if it was cast: [Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.] Paradigm shift {W} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for {W})

card.name: Hidanko First-Year
card.text: Whenever Hidanko First-Year attacks while you control two or more Stations, it gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Redhorn Channeler
card.text: Prowess Whenever Redhorn Channeler dies, it deals damage equal to its power to target opponent.

card.name: Rail Lines Constructor
card.text: Affinity for stations (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each station you control.) Stationcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Station card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Consider
card.text: Surveil 1. Draw a card.

card.name: Miyakawa Officers
card.text: Prowess When Miyakawa Officers enters, [return up to one other target creature to its owner’s hand.] Paradigm shift {U} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for {U})

card.name: Rail Line Daydreamer
card.text: Vigilance 4W, {T}: Other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. This ability costs {3} less to activate if you control two or more Stations.

card.name: Nekomata Nightmare
card.text: Menace Whenever you conjure one or more cards, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Seijuku Engineer
card.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. {T}, Exile a card named Fatigue from your graveyard: Draw a card.

card.name: Hollow Temptations
card.text: Surveil 2. Draw 2 cards. You lose 2 life. Conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Instructor's Guidance
card.text: Enchant creature When Instructor’s Guidance enters, conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”) Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

card.name: Seijuku Field Mechanic
card.text: Vigilance When Seijuku Field Mechanic enters, [Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.] Paradigm shift 2U (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 2U)

card.name: Graffittied Train Yard
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. --- This Tale’s source becomes a Mountain Forest in addition to its other types. (It has {T}: Add {R} or {G}.)

card.name: Pier Line Aquarium
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. --- This Tale’s source becomes an Island Swamp in addition to its other types. (It has {T}: Add {U} or {B}.)

card.name: Tidepool Sanctum Station
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. --- This tale’s source becomes a Forest Island in addition to its other types. (It has {T}: Add {G} or {U}.)

card.name: Private Convoy Line
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. --- This Tale’s source becomes a Swamp Mountain in addition to its other types. (It has {T}: Add {B} or {R}.)

card.text: {T}: Add {C}. --- This tale’s source becomes a Forest Plains in addition to its other types. (It has {T}: Add {G} or {W}.)

card.text: {T}: Add {C}. --- This Tale’s source becomes a Plains Island in addition to its other types. (It has {T}: Add {W} or {U}.)

card.name: Hebika Station Ruins
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. --- This Tale’s source becomes a Swamp Forest in addition to its other types. (It has {T}: Add {B} or {G}.)

card.name: Back-Alley Station
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. --- This Tale’s source becomes a Plains Swamp in addition to its other types. (It has {T}: Add {W} or {B}.)

card.name: Central Subway System
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. --- This Tale’s source becomes an Island Mountain in addition to its other types. (It has {T}: Add {U} or {R}.)

card.name: Academy Rail Line
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. --- This Tale’s source becomes a Mountain Plains in addition to its other types. (It has {T}: Add {R} or {W}.)

card.name: Fixed Point in Reality
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Fixed Point in Reality: Search your library for a basic land or Station card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. The next Tale spell you cast this turn costs {1} less to cast.

card.name: Honor Roll Blademaster
card.text: When Honor Roll Blademaster enters, if you control a creature with power greater than it’s base power, [exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play one of them.] Paradigm shift 1R (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 1R)

card.name: Swordsmanship Club Clique
card.text: When Swordsmanship Club Clique enters, [create two 1/1 white and black Student creature tokens.] Paradigm shift 1W (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 1W)

card.name: Academy-Issue Bokken
Azure Gust Descendant
card.text: You may pay {U} and exile a card named Fatigue from your graveyard rather than pay this spell’s mana cost. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”) Flying, prowess

card.name: Drag to the Void
card.text: The owner of target nonland permanent puts it into their library third from the top or on the bottom. If {B} was spent to cast this spell, return up to one creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Erase From Cognition
card.text: Flash Enchant creature, land, or planeswalker Enchanted permanent is a colorless land with “{T}: Add {C}” and loses all other card types and abilities.

card.name: Rapid Takedown
card.text: Destroy target tapped creature. If {U} was spent to cast this spell, Surveil 2.

card.name: Shrine Shadowspear
card.text: Menace Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

card.name: Taraikyo Stage-Maiden
card.text: {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color. {T}, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Terminal Encounters
card.text: Enchant land When Terminal Encounters enters, conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand. If enchanted land is a Station, draw a card instead. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”) Enchanted land has “{T}: Add two mana of different colors.”

card.name: Urban Huntress
card.text: Flash Whenever Urban Huntress deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Erratic Pilot
card.text: Flash When Erratic Pilot enters, you may pay 2 life. If you do, [Surveil 2, then draw a card.] Paradigm shift 1U (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 1U)

card.name: Strategist's Uplink
card.text: Flash When Strategist’s Uplink enters, return target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand. Whenever you cast an instant spell, or a spell with flash, scry 1.

card.name: Security Proxy
card.text: Vigilance {T}, Sacrifice Security Proxy: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.
